newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan's Engro Chemical dips 17.84 pct.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan's Engro Chemical dips 17.84 pct.

text.p: Pakistan's blue chip Engro Chemical 10-rupee stock sagged 33 rupees, or 17.84 percent, to 152 on Tuesday after the payment of cash dividend and bonus shares by the company, dealers said.
A turnover of 4,700 shares of the stock was recorded at the Karachi Stock Exchange by midsession.

The company paid 80 percent cash dividend and 25 percent bonus stocks in calendar 1996 compared to 60 percent cash dividend and 20 percent bonus shares the previous year. Company's year ends in December.
